price: (42) It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.
arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mā tadharu min shayin atat ʿalayhi illā jaʿalathu kal-ramīmi
